code_info.code: {'name': 'repartition_loan_decision', 'description': 'Repartition loan decision data before final export', 'conditionals': [], 'dataset': 'ddep-metadata://au.com.demolabs.ddep.abc025.transform/dataset/abc025_loan_decision@latest', 'strategy': {'partitions': 10, '$': 'au.com.demolabs.ddep.metadata.v2.process.stage.LiteralRepartitionStrategy'}, 'columns': [], '$': 'au.com.demolabs.ddep.metadata.v2.process.stage.RepartitionDataframeStage'}

spark.sql("CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW loan_decision_summary AS SELECT d.application_id, d.customer_id, r.risk_category, d.decision_status, d.approved_amount, d.interest_rate, CAST(CURRENT_DATE() AS DATE) AS decision_date, d.loan_term_months, CAST(YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) AS INT) AS ddep_year, CAST(MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) AS INT) AS ddep_month, CAST(DAY(CURRENT_DATE()) AS INT) AS ddep_day FROM abc025_loan_decision d JOIN abc025_risk_assessment r ON d.application_id = r.application_id AND d.customer_id = r.customer_id")

abc025_risk_assessment_loan_decision_sum.operation_description: Join abc025_loan_decision and abc025_risk_assessment by application_id and customer_id

code_info.code: spark.sql("CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW loan_decision_summary AS SELECT d.application_id, d.customer_id, r.risk_category, d.decision_status, d.approved_amount, d.interest_rate, CAST(CURRENT_DATE() AS DATE) AS decision_date, d.loan_term_months, CAST(YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) AS INT) AS ddep_year, CAST(MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) AS INT) AS ddep_month, CAST(DAY(CURRENT_DATE()) AS INT) AS ddep_day FROM abc025_loan_decision d JOIN abc025_risk_assessment r ON d.application_id = r.application_id AND d.customer_id = r.customer_id")

abc025_loan_decision_loan_decision_summa.operation_description: Join abc025_loan_decision and abc025_risk_assessment by application_id and customer_id

code_info.code: spark.sql("CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW loan_decision_summary AS SELECT d.application_id, d.customer_id, r.risk_category, d.decision_status, d.approved_amount, d.interest_rate, CAST(CURRENT_DATE() AS DATE) AS decision_date, d.loan_term_months, CAST(YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) AS INT) AS ddep_year, CAST(MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) AS INT) AS ddep_month, CAST(DAY(CURRENT_DATE()) AS INT) AS ddep_day FROM abc025_loan_decision d JOIN abc025_risk_assessment r ON d.application_id = r.application_id AND d.customer_id = r.customer_id")

spark.sql("INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE abc025_final_export SELECT application_id, customer_id, risk_category, decision_status, approved_amount, interest_rate, decision_date, ddep_year, ddep_month, ddep_day FROM loan_decision_summary ORDER BY application_id")

loan_decision_summary_abc025_final_expor.operation_description: Copy application_id column from loan_decision_summary to abc025_final_export

tmp_abc025_final_export.name: tmp_abc025_final_export
tmp_abc025_final_export.entity_value: Temporary table with calculated monthly payment

abc025_final_export_1.name: abc025_final_export
abc025_final_export_1.entity_value: Final table with calculated monthly payment

code_info.code: spark.sql("""CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tmp_abc025_final_export AS SELECT *, CAST((approved_amount * (interest_rate/1200) * POWER(1 + interest_rate/1200, 360)) / (POWER(1 + interest_rate/1200, 360) - 1) AS DECIMAL(15, 2)) AS monthly_payment FROM abc025_final_export;""")

spark.sql("""CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tmp_abc025_final_export AS SELECT *, CAST((approved_amount * (interest_rate/1200) * POWER(1 + interest_rate/1200, 360)) / (POWER(1 + interest_rate/1200, 360) - 1) AS DECIMAL(15, 2)) AS monthly_payment FROM abc025_final_export;""")

abc025_final_export_tmp_abc025_final_exp.operation_description: Calculate monthly payment as approved_amount times interest_rate over 360 months

code_info.code: spark.sql("""REPLACE INTO abc025_final_export SELECT * FROM tmp_abc025_final_export""")

tmp_abc025_final_export_abc025_final_exp.operation_description: Copy application_id from tmp_abc025_final_export to abc025_final_export

code_info.code: spark.sql("""CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tmp_abc025_final_export AS SELECT *, CAST((monthly_payment * 360 - approved_amount) AS DECIMAL(15, 2)) AS total_interest FROM abc025_final_export;""")
spark.sql("""CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tmp_abc025_final_export AS SELECT *, CAST((monthly_payment * 360 - approved_amount) AS DECIMAL(15, 2)) AS total_interest FROM abc025_final_export;""")
spark.sql("""REPLACE INTO abc025_final_export SELECT * FROM tmp_abc025_final_export""")

tmp_abc025_final_export_abc025_final_exp.operation_description: Copy application_id from tmp_abc025_final_export to abc025_final_export
